title: All-Villa Jumeirah Maldives Private Island Luxury with Daily Dining, Nightly Cocktails & Roundtrip Malé Transfers
description:
Mediterranean glamour and signature barefoot luxury combine on a five-star private villa stay at Jumeirah Maldives Olhahali Island. An oasis of elegance amid the idyllic North Malé Atoll, the island features just a handful of Greek-inspired overwater and beach pool villas, offering an escape that’s beautiful and secluded in equal measure. Spend sun-kissed days walking lush jungle paths, exploring colourful reefs beneath crystal-clear waters, and admiring every glorious panoramic sunset view from the comfort of your own private terrace.

Savour international and local classics at Glow, beachside grilled seafood and moreish mezze at Shimmers, or sumptuous Peruvian-Japanese Nikkei cuisine at Kayto. Add private butler service, a cinema under the stars, a coffee lounge importing only the finest beans from across the world and a laidback gelateria, and you're all set to make the most of days spent in paradise.
offer_address: Olhahali Island, North Male Atoll, Olhahali, Maldives

title: All-Villa Jumeirah Maldives Luxury with Private Butler Service
description: Reconnect while you disconnect at Jumeirah Olhahali Island Maldives, an impeccable five-star, all-villa resort, tucked away amid the crystalline turquoise waters of the North Malé Atoll. Legendary Jumeirah luxury meets Maldivian splendour at this private island paradise: dine barefoot at the resort's beachfront Glow restaurant, poolside Shimmers beach club or Nikkei-inspired Kayto restaurant, then, bliss out at the overwater Talise Spa before cooling off poolside or on the white sands.
offer_address: Olhahali Island, North Male Atoll, Olhahali, Maldives
